arts.ttl: Two sent off as underdog Mainz beats Augsburg in eventful Bundesliga clash
arts.sum: Two minutes later, Jonathan Burkardt glanced home a second from another of Mwene’s crosses from the left. Mainz got its first win in the Bundesliga when Phillipp Mwene’s crosses from the left proved pivotal in an eventful 3-2 win over home side Augsburg on Friday.

arts.ttl: Jonathan Burkardt brace helps 10-man Mainz edge Augsburg in five-goal thriller
arts.sum: Jonathan Burkardt scored twice as Mainz edged Augsburg 3-2 in a thrilling match which both teams ended with ten men. Armindo Sieb celebrates after scoring the opening goal for Mainz, setting the tone for a thrilling match against Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Two sending offs and late VAR Drama: Mainz top Augsburg in Friday night thriller
arts.sum: In a wild tactical affair between two Danish trainers that featured sending offs on both sides, Bo Henriksen's FSV Mainz 05 have prevailed over Jess Thorup's FC Augsburg in a five goal-thriller at the WWK-Arena. Round Four of the 2024/25 German Bundesliga got off to an insane start with Mainz having to cope with the loss of Nadiem Amiri on double yellows in the first half whilst Augsburg then lost Samuel Essende to a straight red in the second. In the end, a brace from Mainzer striker Jonathan Burkardt helped Henriksen's visiting Rheinhessen carry the day over Thorup's hosting Fuggerstädter. Late VAR drama kept the turbulent affair gripping right up until the very end.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Mainz preview: Hosts targeting back-to-back victories
arts.sum: Augsburg will attempt to claim a second straight victory when they welcome Mainz 05 to the WWK Arena on Friday.
Jamie Griffith has taken a look at the whole fixture list for week four of the Bundesliga season and selected a score prediction for each game.

arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
